summary: A khajiit scholar from Elsweyr seeking knowledge about the Dovahkiin. Knowledge that can only be gathered by following the Dovahkiin him/herself. This is my first mod and I have been playing/tweaking it for a month now so there should be little to no bugs at all.
descriptionHtml:
[b]NOTE: This mod is still in a beta form. Improvements are to come!
=============================================
V.35 fixes some 1 hit k.o issues and adds unique armor!!
[/b]===================================================

Back story (ish):

Jo' Adanja, the skilled Khajiit from Elsweyr. A scholar whom has been trained to take on the unforgiving conditions of Skyrim. Jo' Adanja has left her home behind to study the latest rumors of the Dragonborn. She wishes to study this heroic figure. To gather as much knowledge as possible. To do this may require her to follow in the footsteps of the Dragonborn.... literally. 

MADE BY:
KarrotAssualt (Yes, I know it's spelled incorrectly)

COMPATIBILITY:
Should be compatible with every mod. 

[b]SOME THINGS TO KNOW:
-You can find Jo' Adanja in Honningbrew Meadery, just outside of Whiterun. 
-She doesn't have armor or weapons by default, so you'll need to provide for her (just go kill a bandit) 
-She is level 50 by default.
-As this is my first mod, there is a bug (I think it's a bug) where armor doesn't seem to give her protection. She just takes a knee right away after taking a blow from any enemy that's tougher than basic enemy (Ex. Draugr)
-She is invincible, so you don't have to worry about accidentally shooting an arrow through her face and killing her when she's on one knee. 
-I am not sure why this is happening, but she only appears after you get Lydia. (Again, first mod)

Any advice would be appreciated. Please report or feel free to tell me how it works in the comments. Thanks![/b]
author: KarrotAssualt

files.name: JoAdanjaFollower BetaV.30
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed 1- hit K.O.
Added a unique starting outfit (One in the images)
